Package utilities

Class BattleshipNetwork

java.lang.Object
utilities.BattleshipNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class BattleshipNetwork extends Object implements Runnable
This class is used by both players to constantly be ready to receive a message and do the necessary actions after reading in a message object. This class also determines which kind of message the other player gave based on what fields of the message object aren't null. This class is also seen as a thread that constantly runs while the view is running and it stops once the Battleship game is over.
Author:
Luke Genova, Amimul Ehsan Zoha

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleshipNetwork

      public BattleshipNetwork(Socket connection, BattleshipController controller, ObjectOutputStream output)
      BattleshipNetwork constructor.
      Parameters:
      connection - An object that represents the established connection between the server and the client.
      controller - An object used by the view to pass data through which then determines if the data is valid.
      output - An object that is used to transfer data from one process to another.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method contains a loop that constantly checks for input from the other player. Once a message is acquired, it then checks what kind of message it was given and do the necessary actions needed to continue the game. This method is called by a thread object created in the view.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • isExceptionMessage

      private void isExceptionMessage(BattleshipMessage message)
      This private method determines if the message received is meant to notify the current player that an exception occurred with the other player. The message also checks if the other player has no more ships left, meaning that the game has ended.
      Parameters:
      message - An object that represents the message that was received.

    • isMoveMessage

      private void isMoveMessage(BattleshipMessage message)
      This private method determines if the message received contains a move that the other player just made. It then calls the controller to register the move and give it to the model. Handle the case where the other player made a invalid move.
      Parameters:
      message - An object that represents the message that was received.

    • isUpdateGridMessage

      private void isUpdateGridMessage(BattleshipMessage message)
      This private method checks if the current message is meant to have the other player update their grid after they made a move.
      Parameters:
      message - An object that represents the message that was received.

    • endGame

      private void endGame(BattleshipMessage message)
      This private method determines what happens after the game ends. If the current player lost their fleet, then they would get alert that they lost the game and would get the locations of the opponents grid. If the current player won, then they would close the connection between the two players.
      Parameters:
      message - An object that represents the message that was received.
